__e: I've done nothing but be helpful to you, and it's 'cause of me that you made dozens of arrests, and you shut down the drug business in this town, and now you want to come after me?
You can't just arrest me and it's over. There are men behind the men.

99% of the drug busts I worked were market-facing.

In and out of jail, multiple drug arrests, which stopped two years ago.
